long_description: Sacrifice nothing-not durability, dependability or performance. SRAM Rival rear derailleur offers nimble shifting with unyielding precision. Exact Actuation(TM) delivers even gear changes over the entire shifting range via a precise 3mm adjustment from gear to gear. Maximized for 10-speed systems, the Rival design descends from legendary SRAM MTB rear derailleurs. Aluminum cage and inner link combine light weight and high structural integrity.
short_description: Sacrifice nothing-not durability, dependability or performance. SRAM Rival rear derailleur offers nimble shifting with unyielding precision.
